overview: A former circus performer and Clown College graduate, performer Steve-O first came to widespread public attention as part of the TV show Jackass. Steve-O was always the one willing to go a little farther, and risk a little more when it came to stunts and gags. A one-man freak show, Steve-O now brings us his latest effort, Steve-O Gross Misconduct (Uncensored).
title: Steve-O: Gross Misconduct Uncensored
